snippet: The Korean Central News Agency, a state agency, said that more than 30 percent of the country’s rice paddies were drying up.
abstract: North Korea's state news agency says 30 percent of rice paddies in country are drying up due to worst drought experienced in 100 years.
lead_paragraph: The Korean Central News Agency, a state agency, said that more than 30 percent of the country’s rice paddies were drying up.

headline.main: North Korea Says It’s Facing Its Worst Drought in a Century
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North Korea: Severe Drought Reported
